data.title: Amphilophus amarillo Stauffer & McKaye 2002
data.meta_description: Amphilophus amarillo Stauffer & McKaye 2002. Yellow Midas Cichlid; Mojarra Amarilla Vouchers: (other collections) PSU 3448 (6) and 3448.1 (1). Distribution: Central America; endemic to the Lago Xiloá, Nicaragua; (Nicaragua) LN (Atlantic); 45– 45 masl; Sec, Pot. Occurrence and conservation status: Nat, End; VU D2 (2020), population trend stable. Literature: Stauffer & McKaye (2002: 8; original description) and Stauffer et al. (2008: 117; comparative morphological data and information on distribution).

Description

Amphilophus amarillo Stauffer & McKaye 2002. Yellow Midas Cichlid; Mojarra Amarilla

Vouchers: (other collections) PSU 3448 (6) and 3448.1 (1). Distribution: Central America; endemic to the Lago Xiloá, Nicaragua; (Nicaragua) LN (Atlantic); 45– 45 masl; Sec, Pot. Occurrence and conservation status: Nat, End; VU D2 (2020), population trend stable. Literature: Stauffer & McKaye (2002: 8; original description) and Stauffer et al. (2008: 117; comparative morphological data and information on distribution).

Notes

Published as part of Angulo, Arturo, Betts, Joel T., González-Alemán, Néstor J., Castañeda, Edgar, Berghe, Eric Van Den, Elías, Diego J., Mcmahan, Caleb D. & Matamoros, Wilfredo A., 2023, Continental fishes of Nicaragua: diversity, distribution and conservation status; with an annotated and illustrated checklist of species and an identification guide to families, pp. 1-89 in Zootaxa 5376 (1) on page 48, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.5376.1.1, http://zenodo.org/record/10208788
